participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and sociable, Jessica enjoys engaging with others at the gym and has a passion for cars. She is independent and focused on her career while exploring her interests.
participant_1.background: my favorite shirts are band shirts and ruffle sleeves. i'm a blonde girl with really short hair. i love wearing skinny jeans and leggings. my favorite hobbies are listening to music and playing video games.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: Ethan is cheerful and imaginative, always excited about adventures and new experiences. He loves to share his joy with friends and enjoys playful activities.
participant_2.background: i am in the third grade. mickey mouse is my favorite character. i love to go to disney world every year. i love to sing songs from the movie frozen. i play with my friends on the playground.

content.text: This is your profile. During the dialog pretend to be this person

i go to the gym most days just to socialize.
i like to spend my money on cars.
i've never had a steady relationship.
i work from home.
